member.name: T:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSource
member.summary: The BOEDataSource class implements the custom BusinessObjects Enterprise data source control for tabular (flat) data.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BOEDataSource class.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSource.MembershipProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the friendly name of the membership provider for this control.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSource.SelectCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets a CMS query string, written in the BOE Query Language, to retrieve information from the CMS repository.

member.name: T:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSourceView
member.summary: Supports the BOEDataSource control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data operations against the BusinessObjects Enterprise CMS database.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSourceView.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments,System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback)
member.summary: Retrieves data from the CMS repository using arguments specified in the BOE Query Language.
member.param: The arguments tell the Select method how to sort the data. If the UI is handling sorting and paging, it also specifies what page of data to return.
The callback to the view.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSourceView.CanPage
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the view that is associated with the control supports paging.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the view that is associated with the control is able to determine the number of rows returned in a query.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEDataSourceView.CanSort
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the view that is associated with the control supports sorting. It is false if the SelectCommand value contains a TOP N query; otherwise true.

member.name: T:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalDataSource
member.summary: The BOEHierarchicalDataSource class implements the custom BusinessObjects Enterprise data source control for hierarchical data.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BOEHierarchicalDataSource class.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalDataSource.Home
member.summary: Gets or sets the name that you want to display for the home node of the hierarchy.

member.summary: Gets or sets the friendly name of the membership provider for this control.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalDataSource.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to display folders or categories in the hierarchical control.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalDataSource.QueryFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets a QueryFilter that can filter out some nodes.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalDataSource.Roots
member.summary: Gets the collection of roots to display.

member.name: T:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalDataSourceView
member.summary: Supports the BOEHierarchicalDataSource control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data operations against the BusinessObjects Enterprise CMS database.

member.summary: A helper function to convert a node's viewpath to the corresponding object id in the CMS.
member.param: The unique hierarchical path to the view.
member.returns: The object id in the CMS.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select
member.summary: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
member.returns: A list of the data items.

member.summary: A hierarchical collection of data that the BOEHierarchicalDataSourceView returns.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalEnumerable.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator for iterating over the objects in the collection.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets an IHierarchyData object from an enumerated item.
member.param: The object to return an IHierarchyData instance for.
member.returns: An IHierarchyData instance that represents the object passed into the GetHierarchyData method.

member.name: T:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData
member.summary: Represents one node of a hierarchical data structure. It consists of the node as well as properties that describe characteristics of the node. Used by the BusinessObjects Enterprise hierarchical data source control.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.GetChildren
member.summary: Gets an enumerable that represents the child nodes of the current node.
member.returns: An enumerable that represents the child nodes of the current node.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.GetParent
member.summary: Gets the parent node of the current node.
member.returns: The parent node of the current node.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the object.
member.returns: A string containing the value of the Title property.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.CUID
member.summary: Gets the SI_CUID which is the unique cluster ID of the object represented by the node. Read-Only.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.HasChildren
member.summary: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether the node has any child nodes. Read-Only.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.ID
member.summary: Gets the SI_ID of the object represented by the node. Read-Only.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.Item
member.summary: Gets the hierarchical data node that the BOEHierarchyData object represents.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.Path
member.summary: Gets the hierarchical path of the node.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.Title
member.summary: Gets the SI_NAME of the object represented by the node.

member.name: P:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEHierarchyData.Type
member.summary: Gets the SI_KIND of the object represented by the node.

member.name: T:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEMembershipProvider
member.summary: Used for validating users of a BusinessObjects Enterprise system. Supports the BOEDataSource control and provides an interface that lets data-bound controls perform data operations against the BusinessObjects Enterprise CMS database.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BOEMembershipProvider class.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEMembershipProvider.ChangePassword(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: If you are using secEnterprise authentication, this method updates the user's password. It is not supported for other authentication types. Takes the username, the old password, and the new password.
member.param: The username to change the password for.
The old password associated with the username.
The user's new password.
member.returns: True if the password was successfully updated, and False otherwise.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEMembershipProvider.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Not supported.

member.summary: Not supported.

member.name: M:BusinessObjects.Enterprise.Providers.BOEMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Gets a collection of users that match a specified username.
member.param: The username to look for.
The zero-based index of the page of results to return.
The size of the page of results to return.
The number of records that matched the specified username.
member.returns: A collection of users that contains a page of results that is of the size specified by iPageSize and that starts at the page specified by iPageIndex.
